(2008) | Next album = '''''[[Look Alive (EP)]]'''''
(2009) }} '''''We Are the Ocean''''' is the self-titled debut [[Extended play|EP]] by [[post-hardcore]] band [[We Are the Ocean]]. The EP was self-released on August 4, 2008, and the band are currently writing a debut full-length album for release in January 2010. The album was originally released through the band's official [[MySpace]] page; it was limited to 1,000 available copies on its release, and they sold out within one day. Promotional videos were released for the songs 'Nothing Good Has Happened Yet' and 'God Damn Good'. ==Track listing== {{tracklist | title1 = Don't Be Careless | length1 = 3:07 | title2 = Nothing Good Has Happened Yet | length2 = 3:36 | title3 = Welcome to My Broken Home | length3 = 2:27 | title4 = Ready for the Fall | length4 = 4:56 | title5 = God Damn Good | length5 = 3:19 | title6 = Days | length6 = 3:02 | title7 = Save Me Said the Saviour | length7 = 3:44 }} ==References== {{reflist}} [[Category:We Are the Ocean albums]] [[Category:2008 EPs]]
